Q.1. Recently, who became India's first transgender operator in Common Service Center?
Q.2. A MoU was signed between which company and South Delhi Municipal Corporation on setting up a waste to energy plant at Okhla in Delhi?
Q.3. Who was named India's Most Valuable Player of the 21st century by Wisden for his contribution in both batting and fielding?

Q.4. Which country became the first African country to submit the results for Reducing Emissions from Deforestation and forest Degradation to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change?
Q.5. Fitch Ratings Inc. in its June 2020 update of Global Economic Outlook, has lowered India's growth forecast for FY 2021-22 to what percent from 9.5 % projected in may 2020?
Q.6. The World Bank approved how much fund for MSMEs Emergency Response Program to support severely impacted MSMEs in India due to COVID-19 crisis?
Q.7. India's Artificial Intelligence enabled "MyGov Corona Helpdesk" won two awards in 4th CogX, 2020. What was the theme of CogX 2020?
(A) How do we get healthy in next 10 years?
(B) How do we get the next 10 years right?
(C) How do we get corona free in next 10 years?
(D) How do we get global peace in next 10 years?

Q.9. Which country cancelled the 2021 Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum due to the COVID-19 pandemic and is opting to lead a virtual summit?
Q.10. Whose term has been extended as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Union Bank of India by 2 years till May 31, 2022?

Q.12. Who is writer of the book 'Bharatiya Loktanktra Ka Koras: Kuch Bisari Bikhari Dhwaniyan'?
Q.13. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank, Union Minister of Human Resource and Development launched the world's first online B.Sc Degree in Programming and Data science. Which Institue prepared this programme?

Q.16. Who assumed charge as the chairman of Indian Oil Corporation?
Q.17. Indian Navy and which country's Navy have conducted a day long Naval Exercise PASSEX for tactical and communications training, towards the Malacca Strait in the Indian Ocean Region?
